itunes:title: Season 6 Premiere!  Homemaker Chic Does NOLA!
title: Season 6 Premiere!  Homemaker Chic Does NOLA!
description:
We're back girlfriends!  And we did something VERY special during our break in between Seasons 5 and 6.  Tune in and listen in on all our memories, and learn all the things Ang does that drive Shaye crazy...when she's not too busy ordering Angela's coffee for her that is.

We want to thank you for listening to our sponsors and supporting them. Homemaker Chic wouldn’t be here without these advertisers and so we really want to thank you for giving us just a few minutes of your time to share these great companies with you.

BECOME A PATRON for Ultimate Homemaker Perks!  Visit:
www.Patreon.com/HomemakerChicPodcast
 
Today's show is brought to you by the OLD WORLD DESIGN SOCIETY!
https://www.parisiennefarmgirl.com/old-world-design-society/
SPRING PRE-SALE GOES LIVE on 3/26!  GET YOUR PRINT VERSION!
The Old World Design Society is a place for individuals who cherish the elements of a bygone era. It’s for people who live by the motto that ‘new is not always better’ and have a collective
love for the lived-in spaces and heirloom pieces that make a ‘house’ a ‘home’.
Craving inspiration?
Velvet sofas, gilded frames, ironstone, hand-sewn linens, vintage books, regal estates, and charming cottages? As a part of the Old World Design Society, you’ll have access to rich, inspiring creativity and education and, best of all, you’ll meet friends who speak your language.
Enjoy a quarterly publication (paper or digital), online group support, design challenges, early access to Angela's Private Collection Sales and more!
Get your Winter edition before it's GONE and get your SPRING COPY before they sell out!
https://www.parisiennefarmgirl.com/old-world-design-society/

Today's show is also brought to you by Toups and Co. Organics!
Toups and Co. is your one-stop online shop for all things natural and organic. This is a company created by my friend Emily who has taken quality ingredients in makeup, skincare, and more to an entirely new level. Emily has stocked Toups and Co. with tallow balms, deodorant, shampoo, soap, foundation, lipstick, skin tonics, eyeshadow, and much, much more. Emily dreams of women using her makeup and skincare products with confidence, knowing that their putting the purest, most natural ingredients onto their bodies and enjoying the pleasure that comes with taking the very best care of your skin and body. Try the Frankincense tallow balm and feel the whipped, silky pleasure of massaging it into your chapped garden hands. Try the red wine lipstick and enjoy feeling dressed up, even if it’s just for your children or chickens. Visit toupsandco.com to stock your bathroom and makeup case with pure, beautiful products from Toups & Co. Visit https://www.toupsandco.com (t-o-u-p-s) and use coupon code HOMEMAKER for 10% off your order.


Cue the WINE MUSIC!   https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic​
Today’s “What We’re Sipping” segment is brought to you by Dry Farm Wines is an online wine subscription that pairs organic, biodynamic, naturally yeasted, low-sugar, lower-alcohol wines from all over the world. As Dry Farm customers, we get to share in their love for organic, natural, and traditionally made wines.  “better, not more.” So check out their better wines. You can get either 3,6 or 12 bottles delivered to your door monthly.
https://www.dryfarmwines.com/homemakerchic​
